price: But people have divided themselves into sects, yet they will all return to Us.
arabic: وَتَقَطَّعُوٓاْ أَمۡرَهُم بَيۡنَهُمۡۖ كُلٌّ إِلَيۡنَا رَٰجِعُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wataqaṭṭaʿū amrahum baynahum kullun ilaynā rājiʿūna
